content.raw:
For my head frame answer of

```
#!python

answer 2.83569 -0.362355 -0.26923 0 0 1 51 228000000
```

the test output is:

```
#!python

          Position: real             [2.7580 -0.4194 1.0045]
                    answer           [2.7489 -0.3621 1.2747]
                    euclidean error  [0.276306]
```

so there is some sort of transform from my logged answer to the answer shown in the test score.  I noted that all of the z axis values in the test score report (both real and answer) are positive, while in fact many of the lights are lower than the head frame, so something is not correct.
content.html:
For my head frame answer of

answer 2.83569 -0.362355 -0.26923 0 0 1 51 228000000

the test output is:

          Position: real             [2.7580 -0.4194 1.0045]
                    answer           [2.7489 -0.3621 1.2747]
                    euclidean error  [0.276306]

so there is some sort of transform from my logged answer to the answer shown in the test score. I noted that all of the z axis values in the test score report (both real and answer) are positive, while in fact many of the lights are lower than the head frame, so something is not correct.
